Question: Chipolo CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Chipolo

Perfectly Imperfect Chipolo CARD Spot

- Limited edition item tracker with minor cosmetic imperfections
- Engraved with "Perfectly Imperfect" on one side and distinctive blemish on the other
- Made from plastic with minor imperfections to reduce waste and support sustainability
- Works exclusively with the Apple Find My network
- Partnership with non-profits, donating $1 for every tracker sold
- Showcased at CES 2024 and available for purchase starting January 9
